00084             function                set_group( $Options )
00085             {
00086                   try
00087                   {
00088                         $Permit = $this->Security->get_gp( 'permit' , 'command' );
00089                         $MasterType = $this->Security->get_gp( 'master_type' , 'command' );
00090                         
00091                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'ids' , 'set' ) )
00092                         {
00093                               $MasterId = explode( ',' , $this->Security->get_gp( 'ids' , 'string' ) );
00094                         }
00095                         else
00096                         {
00097                               $MasterId = array( $this->Security->get_gp( 'master_id' , 'integer' ) );
00098                         }
00099 
00100                         $this->PermitAccess->set_group_for_object( $Permit , $MasterId , $MasterType );
00101                   }
00102                   catch( Exception $e )
00103                   {
00104                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00105                   }
00106             }

00210             function                on_set_single_group_for_object( $Parameters )
00211             {
00212                   try
00213                   {
00214                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'group_name' , 'set' , false ) &&
00215                               $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
00216                         {
00217                               $GroupAccess = get_package( 'permit::group_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00218                               
00219                               $MasterId = get_field( $Parameters , 'master_id' );
00220                               $MasterType = get_field( $Parameters , 'master_type' );
00221                               
00222                               $GroupList = $this->Security->get_gp( 'group_list' , 'string' );
00223                               $GroupList = explode( ',' , $GroupList );
00224                               foreach( $GroupList as $i => $Title )
00225                               {
00226                                     $GroupAccess->delete_group_for_object( $Title , $MasterId , 'user' );
00227                               }
00228                               
00229                               $GroupName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'group_name' , 'command' );
00230                               
00231                               $GroupAccess->add_group_for_object( $GroupName , $MasterId , 'user' );
00232                         }
00233                   }
00234                   catch( Exception $e )
00235                   {
00236                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00237                   }
00238             }
00239             
00258             function                controller( $Options )
00259             {
00260                   try
00261                   {
00262                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00263                         
00264                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_set_group' );
00265                         
00266                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_delete_group' );
00267                         
00268                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_toggle_group' );
00269                         
00270                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00271                   }
00272                   catch( Exception $e )
00273                   {
00274                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00275                   }
00276             }
